column12: Heroes and monsters start incapaciated randomly
Skeleton Warriors (add 3 if none) have stun melee
Monsters steal 100 gold when they hit
Overseer chooses a monster type that will take AN extra melee shot
Dungeon monsters gain Retaliation. Add 1 dungeon monster if none.
Before resolution, add two centaurs or one cerberus at hero start zone and engage in battle.
Heroes choose 3 monsters types; they cannot appear in next room
Before resolution, add 6 non-frenzy zombies to hero start zone
Infernal monsters take extra fireball shot. Add 1 if none.
